name: src/mortar.js
Context
description: Mortar Context

name: module
description: The module object used to resolve lazy requires.

name: parent
description: The parent {@link Context} instance. Allows to set up hierarchical dependency injection containers.

name: wire
description: Registers a value to a provider for `key`.

params.name: subject
params.description: The value you want to register to the context

params.name: constructable
params.description: whether `new` should be used or the function should be called directly

properties.name: as.singleton
properties.description: registers `subject` as a singleton provider for `key`

name: require
description:
Sets up lazy `require`ing of `id` when `key` is requested, relative to `module`.

See {@link Context#wire}

properties.name: as.singleton
properties.description: registers `id` to be lazily required as a singleton provider for `key`

properties.name: as.producer
properties.description: registers `id` to be lazily required as a producer for `key`

properties.name: as.value
properties.description: registers `id` to be lazily required as a value for `key`

name: release
description: Unregisters `key`

name: resolve
description: Retrieves `subject`'s dependencies and calls it.

params.name: constructable
params.description: whether `new` should be used or the function should be called directly

name: using
description: Allows you to override registered dependencies through another {@link Context} or mapping.

name: retrieve
description: Retrieves the value registered to `key` using whatever rule it was wired with.

name: has
description: Checks whether a rule is registered to `key`.

name: spawn
description: Spawns a child context

name: getDependencies
description: Parses the dependencies of a function, by name.

name: create
description:
Factory method, creates a new context instance; thin wrapper for:
```js
new Context(module, parent)
```
See {@link Context#constructor}

name: register
description: Registers a provider to all instances. Either provide a named function, or an object with `name` and `configure` propterties

name: isContext
description:
Wrapper for 
```js
subject instanceof Context
```
